---
title: "Results"
---
options(kableExtra.latex.load_packages = FALSE)

```{r}
echo = FALSE
source(here::here("code/table_script.R"))

results15_00 %>%
  kable(
    format = "latex",
    caption = "Simulation results (N2 = 15, $\\gamma_{01}$ = 0.0)",
    escape = FALSE,
    booktabs = TRUE,
    digits = 3,
    col.names = c("", rep(c("Bias","Cov","SD"), times = 5))
  ) %>%
  add_header_above(c(
    " " = 1,
    "CD" = 3, "LD" = 3, "MI-R" = 3, "MI-a" = 3, "Bayes" = 3
  )) %>%
  pack_rows(index = c("ICC = 0.1" = 4, "ICC = 0.3" = 4),
            latex_align = "c") %>%
  pack_rows(index = c("MCAR" = 2, "MAR" = 2, "MCAR" = 2, "MAR" = 2)) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, position = "center") %>%
  landscape()
```
